update.name: FileBot 4.9.6
update.title: New updates available
update.message:
FileBot 4.9.5
This release features:
+ Added Open / Reveal / Rename / Move to Trash context menu
+ Autofill behaviour for Edit Match
+ Improved Conflict resolution messages
+ Improved support for {plex.id} style file paths
+ Enhanced format bindings
+ Lots of minor improvements and bug fixes
